name: Ravenous: Blood is Power
description:
Play as a vampire and balance your health for power! The less health you have, the more powerful you become. How many waves can you survive on the brink of death?

Less health equals more power!

You are Rupert, the friendly neighbourhood vampire. The nearby village has had enough of you, and are storming your lair in waves. Battle against ever increasing waves of enemies while managing your life and power. 

WASD or Arrow keys to move.

Left and Right Mouse Click for attacks.

Space to dash.

Armor gives you an extra hit point without trading power!

CREDITS:

Programming, Game Design, and Art by Zac Lovagi (Writing Reality)

Sound and Music recorded and produced by Jon Lovagi
